name: BenQDeviceControl
0:
”Alexa, turn up the volume on smart projector”
”Alexa, switch to HDMI on smart projector”
”Alexa, go to channel 91 on smart projector”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Video playback, volume controls and input source change with Alexa on your BenQ smart projector.

This skill works with BenQ smart projector and please complete the setup with "Device Control" app on the BenQ home screen.

What you can do:

POWER OFF
"Alexa, turn off smart projector."

VIDEO PLAYBACK
"Alexa, play on smart projector."
"Alexa, pause."
"Alexa, stop."
"Alexa, resume."
"Alexa, next on smart projector."
"Alexa, go back on smart projector."

VOLUME CONTROL
“Alexa, turn up the volume on smart projector.”
“Alexa, turn the volume down."
“Alexa, set volume to 10 on smart projector”

MUTE/UNMUTE
"Alexa, mute smart projector."
"Alexa, unmute."

SWITCH SOURCE
"Alexa, switch to HDMI 1 on smart projector."

BENQ VIDEO TRAY CHANNEL CONTROL
"Alexa, go to channel 91 on smart projector."
"Alexa, channel up on smart projector."
"Alexa, next channel on smart projector."


*Supported Model: BenQ GS1.
